modName: Skull Amulet and Black Elegant Gloves
summary:
Loved the look on Necromancers Amulet and Mystic Tuning Gloves?
I did so i made this small mod :)
descriptionHtml:
All ive done is make a new version of Necromancers Amulet and Mystic Tuning Gloves that can be enchanted.

To add them to your inventory:
open console and type

player.additem xx000D63 1 (to add 1 Amulet) 
player.additem xx0012C7 1 (to add 1 pair of Gloves)

Where xx is the load order id for the mod.
Best way to find out the load order is by using nexus mod manager and look in the plugin tab.


Enjoy :)
author: Lastgammal
